short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension to help people with dyslexia. All features are tested on real people with dyslexia.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is extension is build with efficiency in mind.
When active, the extension will transform every website into a more readable form using some enhancements which are tested on real people.
Some of the features are:

* All fonts are changed to OpenDyslexic (an award winning project for people with dyslexia)
* Special color overlay
* Optionaly forced markup (for websites with a bad or a difficult to read user interface


If you have any bad experiences with this add-on. Please do not put this into the comments below, but in the [issue page](https://github.com/SamClercky/Dyxitool/issues) on Github. There I will be more able to find a proper solution for the problem.

Official website: [https://samclercky.github.io/Dyxitool/](https://samclercky.github.io/Dyxitool/)
